Result: 국내에서는 처음 보고되는 F. asiaticum에 의한 귀리의 붉은 곰팡이병 사례

Title: First Report of Fusarium oxysporum Causing Damping-off on Paprika in Korea
Author:
박미정(농촌진흥청 국립원예특작과학원 원예특작환경과)
백창기(농촌진흥청 국립원예특작과학원 원예특작환경과)
서윤희(농촌진흥청 국립원예특작과학원 원예특작환경과)
박종한(농촌진흥청 국립원예특작과학원 원예특작환경과)
Publisher: The Korean Society of Plant Pathology (한국식물병리학회)
Location: commercial nursery located in Cheorwon, Korea
Result: first report of damping-off caused by Fusarium oxysporum on paprika in Korea
Identification method: morphological characteristics and nucleotide sequence data of translation elongation factor $1-{\alpha}$ and the largest subunit of RNA polymerase

Title: First Report of Kiwifruit Brown Leaf Spot Caused by Fusarium tricinctum in South Korea
Author:
Min-jung Kim
Youngho Kwon
곽연식
Result: first reportof the brown leaf spot caused by F. tricinctum on kiwifruit

Title: Pathogenic characteristics of Fusarium species causing fusarium wilt of soybean in Korea
Author:
Hyo-Won Choi(National Institute of Agricultural Sciences)
Hyo Won Kim(National Institute of Agricultural Sciences)
Jae Geum Lee(National Institute of Agricultural Sciences)
Eun Hye Kang(National Institute of Agricultural Sciences)
Young Kee Lee(National Institute of Agricultural Sciences)
Sung Kee Hong(National Institute of Agricultural Sciences)
Jeom Soon Kim(National Institute of Agricultural Sciences)
Institution: National Institute of Agricultural Sciences (농촌진흥청 국립농업과학원)
Publisher: The Korean Society of Pesticide Science (한국농약과학회)
Result: five cultivars, Daewon, Taegwang, Daepoong, Chamol and Hwanggeumol, were affected by all the tested Fusarium species, whereas no symptoms of wilting were observed on two cultivars, Janggi and Socheongja, inoculated with F. oxysporum and F. solani
Identification method: morphological, molecular characteristics and pathogenicity to soybean

Title: First report of postharvest disease on banana by Fusarium verticilliodes in Korea
Author: Min A Song
Institution: Jeju Agricultural Research and Extension Services (제주농업기술원)
Publisher: The Korean Society of Pesticide Science (한국농약과학회)
Result: first report of crown rot on bananas caused by Fusarium verticillioides in Jeju-do, Korea
Identification method: mycological characteristics, pathogenicity test and the 18S rRNA gene sequence analysis

Title: Occurrence of fusarium head blight on barley in Jeonbuk province related to weather change in 2018
Author:
Ju-Hee Kim(Jeollabuk-do Agricultural Research and Extension Services)
Min-Kyung Choi(Jeollabuk-do Agricultural Research and Extension Services)
In-Yeong Choi(Jeollabuk-do Agricultural Research and Extension Services)

Hyong-gwon Chon(Jeollabuk-do Agricultural Research and Extension Services)
Wang-Hyu Lee(Chonbuk National University)
Institution:
Jeollabuk-do Agricultural Research and Extension Services
Chonbuk National University
Publisher: The Korean Society of Pesticide Science (한국농약과학회)
Location: barley field in Jeonbuk (Iksan, Kimje, and Gunsan)
Result: almost no occurrence in 2017, but it was occurred to 23.6% in 2018

Title: Strains of Fusarium graminearum Isolates from Wheat Kernels in Korea
Author:
Kang, Chon Sik (National Institute of Crop Science, RDA)
Son, Jae Han (National Institute of Crop Science, RDA)
Kim, Kyeong Hoon (National Institute of Crop Science, RDA)
Kim, Kyeong Min (National Institute of Crop Science, RDA)
Park, Jin Hee (National Institute of Crop Science, RDA)
Choi, Chang Hyun (National Institute of Crop Science, RDA)
Park, Tae IL (National Institute of Crop Science, RDA) ; Shin, Sang Hyun (Animal and Plant Quarantine Agency)
Institution:
National Institute of Crop Science (국립식량과학원)
Animal and Plant Quarantine Agency (농림축산검역본부)
Publisher: The Korean Society of Crop Science (한국작물학회)
Location: Jeonbuk, Jeonnam, Chungbuk, Chungnam, Gangwon, and Gyeongnam
Result: F. asiaticum (95% of all isolates), no virulence difference in wheat
Identification method: sequencing: ITS(internal transcribed spacer), TEF1(translation elongation factor 1-α) / Trichothecene chemotype determination: multiplex PCR based on Tri7, Tri13 sequences
